jobs.title: Warm Wishes
jobs.description: The Pinncale Project is collbrating with Warm Wishes

jobs.title: Campaign Pitch Hoilday Market
jobs.description: A December campaign created by the general members of the Pinnacle Project. The Pinnacle Project hosted a hoilday market selling a variey of christmas items (Peppermint Candy Cane, Peach Candy Cane, Hot Chocolate, Cookies,Marshmallows)

jobs.title: We Scare Hunger Event with Minga
jobs.description: On Halloween night, volunteers will be going door-to-door asking for non-perishable food items. Minga has successfully ran the event for the past 10 years, but their total efforts has decreased.

jobs.title: Save The Children
jobs.description: We work to safeguard children from poverty. Our team has created the iniative to provide support and resources to help create safe environments for vulnerable children in the Regional Municipality of Peel.

jobs.title: Eden Food For Change
jobs.description: With a tremendous amount of dilligence, our team was able to deliver over 100 pounds of food to Eden Food for Change which has made a signficant impact to those who are in need.

jobs.title: Community Outreach Programs (Care Packages)
jobs.description: In our March Campaign, The Pinnacle Project raised over $300 and made 50 care packages towards the Peel Family Shelter.Care packages consisted of essentialitems such as socks, water, non-perishable food items, toothbrushes,toothpaste, and skin care products.
